source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Learn Animation Production with Blender
items.headline: Use Blender 3D to create your own amazing 3D animations
objectives_summary: Master Blender's Interface and Navigation
Create 3D Models
UV Map your 3D objects

items.title: Blender 2.79: Complete training from beginner to pro
items.headline: Discover the very last version of Blender , learn modeling, animation, sculpting, rigging, texturing, simulation
objectives_summary: Discover the software to integrate it into your workflow
Apprehend the interface and keyboard shortcuts for better efficiency
Learn polygon modeling, animation and rendering basics.

items.title: Learn to Draw From Your Imagination - Step by Step
items.headline: Learn how to take ideas from your head and draw them on paper
objectives_summary: Draw ideas from your imagination
Create original ideas
Develop your ideas

items.title: Create Game Assets with Blender and Substance Painter
items.headline: Use Blender to create high quality 3D assets for video games
objectives_summary: Create high polygon 3d models in Blender and use retopology techniques to make low poly versions suitable for video game engines.
Bake texture maps in Blender and Substance Painter.
Use PBR texturing tools to create realistic textures for game models.

items.title: Blender 3D from zero to hero

visible_instructors.name: Widhi
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur and lecturer in computer graphic disciplines
visible_instructors.title: Widhi Muttaqien, S.Kom, MMSI

items.headline: The complete guide to learn 3D using Blender from basic to advanced level
objectives_summary: Master the fundamentals of 3D software specifically using Blender.
Create any type of 3D models you can imagine from simple to complex ones using different kind of methods.
Able to create material, texture and understand in-depth UV mapping techniques

items.title: Zbrush: Hard Surface Sculpting for All Levels!
items.headline: An in depth tutorial to sculpting hard surface through Booleans
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you should have a strong foundation to Zbrush tools particularly in hard surface sculpting.
Understand multiple methods of approach in creating complex shapes using live booleans
Have your own customized boolean to use in any of your own projects, both personal and commercial.

items.title: Learn to Animate: Animation Principles
items.headline: How to Animate Level 1: the complete guide to Animation Principles in Adobe Animate
objectives_summary: You will learn the principles of animation, and the tools to become an animator!
You will learn how to bring simple objects and shapes to life, and how to make realistic motion.
You'll learn the important, core principles of animation that form the foundation for animating anything.

items.title: How to Create Retro 3D Graphics with Blender and Gimp
items.headline: Recapture the nostalgia of the Quake and Playstation era
objectives_summary: How to model, rig, texture, animate 3d models in Blender
How to create textures for 3d models with Gimp
How to create character reference sheets in Krita

items.title: Absolute Beginners Zbrush course
items.headline: Zbrush for those who never used it but want to.
objectives_summary: I will slowly and fully explain how to start using Zbrush, how to navigate the interface. The variuos things you need to know to model a head, horns, torso, armors, sword and even a cape, all in Zubrush. While we are working on our character, we will learn how to work with the most important Zbrush functions. I will not make this super complicated by going through everything in Zbrush. I will show you only the things you really need to know to make a fully finished high poly character.

items.title: Learn the ART of Video Games

visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Developer, Creative Director and Writer
visible_instructors.title: Kevin Oxland

items.headline: Learn to create game environments. Draw concept art, create 3D models, texture in Substance Painter and build in Unity.
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, the student should have a solid understanding of art fundamentals, the complete video game art pipeline and how to take a concept image and turn it into a 3D scene that is game ready.

items.title: Ultimate Guide to Drawing Animated Characters
items.headline: Learn to draw characters like a pro.
objectives_summary: Design characters like a pro.

items.title: Introduction to SOLIDWORKS
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of SOLIDWORKS engineering and design software including parts, drawings, and assemblies.
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of SOLIDWORKS
Design Products Confidently Using SOLIDWORKS
Generate Engineering Drawings

items.title: Female Character Creation in Zbrush
items.headline: Learn to sculpt female body, clothing, accessories, weapons, poly paint, pose and render the character in Zbrush.
objectives_summary: Sculpt  female body and face
Making the hair with Fibermesh
Create, adjust and sculpt clothes and gears

items.title: Complete guide to SketchUp & Vray - Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: A simple comprehensive SketchUp and Vray course to take you from beginner to a professional level
objectives_summary: How to use SketchUp to create 3D models
Learn how to use certain Sketchup Extension to elevate your modelling skills
Vray for SketchUp

items.title: The complete course of AutoCAD 3D 2016
items.headline: 3D modeling, Surfacing, Rendering and a lot more in a single course
objectives_summary: Work comfortably with AutoCAD 3D modelling commands
Prepare Solid, Mesh and Surface geometries
Render a photo-realistic drawing

items.title: Complete Whiteboard Animation in VideoScribe - 5 Animations
items.headline: Create Your Own Whiteboard Animations with VideoScribe - No Drawing, Video Editing or Animation Experience Needed!
objectives_summary: Create your own whiteboard animations from scratch with VideoScribe
Start a VideoScribe project from scratch
Master all of the tools of VideoScribe
